definition: to swallow clouds and blow out fog (idiom)/to blow cigarette or opium smoke
to swallow/to take
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
to vomit/to throw up
fog/mist/CL:場|场[chang2],陣|阵[zhen4]

sentences.english: He lit his pipe and exhaled clouds of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 他點燃菸斗並且吞雲吐霧。

sentences.english: I hope you get sick when someone blows smoke in your face .
sentences.chinese: 我希望有人在你面前吞雲吐霧時你會噁心。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
overbearing/arrogant bully
mushroom cloud
(of an aging woman) still attractive
to withdraw/to hole up
to have no sense of shame/brazen
doddering/senile
not to glance sideways (idiom)/to gaze fixedly/to be fully concentrated/to preserve a correct attitude
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to engage in prostitution
to walk right into the trap
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
